con:testCase.name: SOPeriodicEURmorethan99999999amount
con:testCase.con:description:
Periodic Standing Order Agreement for BM Payment
Active Agreement - Other than NOK Currency - more than 99999999 amount- Se PCL is expected in Ihub

value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${Properties#Log_ref}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#AgreementId}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>${Properties#accountType}</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>${Properties#approvalLimit}</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>${Properties#registerLimit}</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>${Properties#numberOfVerifiers}</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>${Properties#numberOfApprovers}</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>${Properties#bookingLevel}</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn1:transaction> <urn2:amount> <urn3:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#DebitorCurrency}" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn3:amount> </urn3:instructedAmount> </urn2:amount> <urn2:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn2:chargeBearer> <urn2:creditorAgent> <urn3:bic </urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditorAgent> <urn2:creditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode><urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>test</urn3:countrySubDivision><urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country>
